what: Effect sizes for Meta-analysis of interactions

title: Effect sizes for Meta-analysis of interactions
text: can install development version minter GitHub:
code: devtools::install_github("fdecunta/minter", force = TRUE)

title: Standardized Mean Difference (SMD) — SMD
text: Standardized Mean Difference (SMD)

title: Standardized Mean Difference (SMD) — SMD
code: SMD(   type,   data,   col_names = c("yi", "vi"),   append = TRUE,   hedges_correction = TRUE,   Ctrl_mean,   Ctrl_sd,   Ctrl_n,   A_mean,   A_sd,   A_n,   B_mean = NULL,   B_sd = NULL,   B_n = NULL,   AB_mean = NULL,   AB_sd = NULL,   AB_n = NULL )

title: Standardized Mean Difference (SMD) — SMD
text: type Type effect size: "ind", "main", "inter" data Data frame containing variables used. col_names Vector two strings name output columns effect size sampling variance. Default 'yi' 'vi'. append Logical. Append results data. Default TRUE hedges_correction Logical. Apply Hedges' correction small-sample bias. Default TRUE Ctrl_mean Mean outcome Control treatment Ctrl_sd Standard deviation control treatment Ctrl_n Sample size control streatment A_mean Mean outcome treatment A_sd Standard deviation treatment A_n Sample size treatment B_mean Mean outcome B treatment B_sd Standard deviation B treatment B_n Sample size B treatment AB_mean Mean outcome interaction AxB treatment AB_sd Standard deviation interaction AxB treatment AB_n Sample size interaction AxB treatment

title: Standardized Mean Difference (SMD) — SMD
text: Facundo Decunta - fdecunta@agro.uba.ar

title: Compute And Format — .compute_and_format
text: effsize_func Function used compute effect size effsize_args Arguments needed function data Data frame use col_names Vector length 2 name columns append Logical. append effect sizes data

title: Main Log Response Ratio — .main_lnRR
text: Morris, W. F., Hufbauer, R. ., Agrawal, . ., Bever, J. D., Borowicz, V. ., Gilbert, G. S., ... & Vázquez, D. P. (2007). (2022). relative benefits environmental enrichment learning memory greater stressed: meta-analysis interactions rodents. title: Standardized Mean Difference for the interaction between Experimental Treatment and Time — .time_interaction_SMD
text: t0_Ctrl_mean Sample mean control group time 0 t0_Ctrl_sd Standard deviation control group time 0 t1_Ctrl_mean Sample mean control group time 1 t1_Ctrl_sd Standard deviation control group time 1 Ctrl_n Sample size control group Ctrl_cor Correlation means control group t0 t1 t0_Exp_mean Sample mean experimental group time 0 t0_Exp_sd Standard deviation experimental group time 0 t1_Exp_mean Sample mean experimental group time 1 t1_Exp_sd Standard deviation experimental group time 1 Exp_n Sample size experimental group Exp_cor Correlation means experimental group t0 t1 hedges_correction Logical. Apply Hedges' correction small-sample bias. Default TRUE.

title: Log Coefficient Of Variation Ratio (lnCVR) — lnCVR
text: type Type effect size: "ind", "main", "inter" data Data frame containing variables used. col_names Vector two strings name output columns effect size sampling variance. Default 'yi' 'vi'. append Logical. Append results data. Default TRUE Ctrl_mean Mean outcome Control treatment Ctrl_sd Standard deviation control treatment Ctrl_n Sample size control streatment A_mean Mean outcome treatment A_sd Standard deviation treatment A_n Sample size treatment B_mean Mean outcome B treatment B_sd Standard deviation B treatment B_n Sample size B treatment AB_mean Mean outcome interaction AxB treatment AB_sd Standard deviation interaction AxB treatment AB_n Sample size interaction AxB treatment

title: Log of Variation Ratio (lnVR) — lnVR
text: type Type effect size: "ind", "main", "inter" data Data frame containing variables used. col_names Vector two strings name output columns effect size sampling variance. Default 'yi' 'vi'. append Logical. Append results data. Default TRUE Ctrl_sd Standard deviation control treatment Ctrl_n Sample size control streatment A_sd Standard deviation treatment A_n Sample size treatment B_sd Standard deviation B treatment B_n Sample size B treatment AB_sd Standard deviation interaction AxB treatment AB_n Sample size interaction AxB treatment

what: Fake factorial dataset with pre-computed effect sizes — testing_data
title: Fake factorial dataset with pre-computed effect sizes — testing_data
text: dataset contains fake data 2×2 factorial experiments four treatment groups: Control (C), Factor , Factor B, combination AB (B together). includes means, standard deviations, sample sizes group, well pre-computed effect sizes: log response ratio (lnRR), standardized mean difference (SMD), variances, main effects , B, interaction (AB).

title: Fake factorial dataset with pre-computed effect sizes — testing_data
code: testing_data

title: Fake factorial dataset with pre-computed effect sizes — testing_data
text: data frame 10 rows 24 columns: C_n, C_mean, C_sd Sample size, mean, SD Control group A_n, A_mean, A_sd Sample size, mean, SD treatment B_n, B_mean, B_sd Sample size, mean, SD B treatment AB_n, AB_mean, AB_sd Sample size, mean, SD AB (B combined) treatment A_main_lnRR, A_main_lnRRv Log response ratio main effect variance B_main_lnRR, B_main_lnRRv Log response ratio main effect B variance AB_main_lnRR, AB_main_lnRRv Log response ratio AB interaction variance A_main_SMD, A_main_SMDv Standardized mean difference (Hedges' g) main effect variance B_main_SMD, B_main_SMDv Standardized mean difference main effect B variance AB_main_SMD, AB_main_SMDv Standardized mean difference AB interaction variance

title: Fake factorial dataset with pre-computed effect sizes — testing_data

title: Fake factorial dataset with pre-computed effect sizes — testing_data
